description: Windows automatically loads the first 100 entries of the LMHOSTS marked with "#PRE" at startup. This number can be changed in the system registry but may be limited by computer performance.

Both the LMHOSTS file and the sample file are located in %windir% on Windows 95, 98, and Millenium Edition. They are located in %windir%system32driversetc. on Windows NT 4.0 through 7 and Windows Server 2003, 2008, and 2008 R2.
NOTE: The LMHOSTS file is not used by Windows 8.

images.alt: Screenshot of a .sam file in SAM Studio
images.caption: SAM file open in SAM Studio
